titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the cathedral church of Bristol, June xxi, MDCLXXXV before his grace Henry, Duke of Beavfort, His Majesties lord lieutenant for that city and county / by Ric. Thompson ...
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Richard, 1647 or 8-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
